name: Witch Child's Playtime
description:
The Witch Child is excited to throw her first tea party in a while tonight. Help her prepare the food and tea, and hopefully she will have a really good time~

Slice of life RPG with psychological horror elements.
4 main ends and 1 special end. Takes about 15-30 minutes to play through one path.

Game made with RPG Maker VX Ace. Original assets and music.

This game contains themes that may be disturbing to a certain audience (unreality, depersonalization, dissociation, abuse, paranoia, mild flashing lights, etc).

I worked hard on this, tipping is appreciated <3
